tool_description: Get useful statistics on tens of thousands of cities around the world. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/city.
name: City by API-Ninjas
title: City by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/city

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country filter. Must be an ISO-3166 alpha-2 code (e.g. **US**).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **1**.
